column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This time round I got the vegetarian ramen with thick noodles. The broth was hot and wholesome
column2: the noodles were tasty and the cauliflowers
column3: spinach and cabbage kept me full for the rest of the evening. To top it all off
column4: the ratio of broth to noodles was perfect--we've all had that moment when we're forced to eat cold noodles because there's like two tablespoons of broth. Jinya won't betray you
